name: SendGrid
description: Welcome to SendGrid’s Web API v3! This API is RESTful, fully featured, and easy to integrate with.

api_methods.name: Send
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to send email over SendGrid’s v3 Web API,

utterances.utterance: Can you send an email using SendGrid for me?
I need to send a message through SendGrid.
Please use SendGrid to dispatch an email.
Could you help me send an email via SendGrid?
I want to send an email using the SendGrid API.
Send an email through SendGrid, please.
Can you use SendGrid to send out an email?
I need assistance with sending an email using SendGrid.
Please send an email using SendGrid's API.
Could you send an email for me through SendGrid?

api_methods.name: Create a batch ID
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to generate a new batch ID. This batch ID can be associated with scheduled sends via the mail/send endpoint.  If you set the SMTPAPI header batch_id, it allows you to then associate multiple scheduled mail/send requests together with the same ID. Then at anytime up to 10 minutes before the schedule date, you can cancel all of the mail/send requests that have this batch ID by calling the Cancel Scheduled Send endpoint.

utterances.utterance: I need a new batch ID for my email campaign.
Can you generate a batch ID for my scheduled emails?
Please create a batch ID for my upcoming email sends.
I want to associate my emails with a new batch ID.
Generate a batch ID for my email scheduling.
I need to create a batch ID for my email distribution.
Can you help me get a batch ID for my email sends?
I want to create a new batch ID for my email tasks.
Please generate a batch ID for my email operations.
I need a batch ID to manage my scheduled emails.

api_methods.name: Cancel or pause a scheduled send
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to cancel or pause an email that has been scheduled to be sent.  If the maximum number of cancellations/pauses are added, HTTP 400 will be returned.  The Cancel Scheduled Sends feature allows the customer to cancel a scheduled send based on a Batch ID included in the SMTPAPI header. Scheduled sends cancelled less than 10 minutes before the scheduled time are not guaranteed to be cancelled.  For more information on Scheduled Sends, visit https://sendgrid.com/docs/Classroom/Send/When_Emails_Are_Sent/can_i_stop_a_scheduled_send.html

utterances.utterance: Can you stop the email I scheduled for later today?
I need to pause the email campaign I set up for tomorrow.
Please cancel the scheduled email I arranged for next week.
Is it possible to halt the email I planned to send this evening?
I want to stop the email blast I scheduled for this afternoon.
Can you pause the email I set to go out on Friday?
Please cancel the email I arranged to send out at noon.
I need to stop the email I scheduled for the weekend.
Can you halt the email I planned for tomorrow morning?
I want to pause the email campaign I set for next Monday.

api_methods.name: Create a new suppression group
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to create a new suppression group.  Suppression groups, or unsubscribe groups, are specific types or categories of email that you would like your recipients to be able to unsubscribe from. For example: Daily Newsletters, Invoices, System Alerts.  The name and description of the unsubscribe group will be visible by recipients when they are managing their subscriptions.  Each user can create up to 25 different suppression groups.

utterances.utterance: I want to set up a new unsubscribe group for our weekly newsletters.
Can you help me create a suppression group for promotional emails?
Please add a new suppression category for system alerts.
I need to establish a new unsubscribe group for our monthly reports.
Let's create a suppression group for event notifications.
Could you set up a new unsubscribe category for our product updates?
I want to add a suppression group for our customer feedback emails.
Create a new unsubscribe group for our holiday offers.
Please set up a suppression category for our billing reminders.
I need to create a new unsubscribe group for our webinar invitations.

api_methods.name: Add suppressions to a suppression group
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to add email addresses to an unsubscribe group.  If you attempt to add suppressions to a group that has been deleted or does not exist, the suppressions will be added to the global suppressions list.  Suppressions are recipient email addresses that are added to unsubscribe groups. Once a recipient's address is on the suppressions list for an unsubscribe group, they will not receive any emails that are tagged with that unsubscribe group.

utterances.utterance: Please add the email addresses to the unsubscribe group with ID 'newsletter_updates'.
Can you add these emails to the suppression group identified by 'event_notifications'?
I need to add some emails to the suppression list for the group 'weekly_digest'.
Add the specified emails to the unsubscribe group with the ID 'product_announcements'.
Could you please add these email addresses to the suppression group 'customer_feedback'?
Add these emails to the suppression list for the group 'promotional_offers'.
Please include these emails in the suppression group with ID 'survey_invitations'.
Can you add the emails to the unsubscribe group 'service_alerts'?
I want to add these email addresses to the suppression group 'monthly_newsletter'.
Add the emails to the suppression list for the group identified as 'special_events'.

api_methods.name: Search for suppressions within a group
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to search a suppression group for multiple suppressions.  When given a list of email addresses and a group ID, this endpoint will return only the email addresses that have been unsubscribed from the given group.  Suppressions are a list of email addresses that will not receive content sent under a given group.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The ID of the suppression group that you would like to search.

utterances.utterance: Can you check which emails are unsubscribed from the 'Weekly Newsletter' group?
I need to find out the suppressed emails in the 'Promotions' group.
Show me the list of emails that have opted out from the 'Event Updates' group.
Which email addresses are suppressed in the 'Product Announcements' group?
Find the unsubscribed emails from the 'Monthly Digest' group.
Can you tell me which emails are not receiving content from the 'Special Offers' group?
I want to know the suppressed emails in the 'Customer Feedback' group.
List the emails that have been unsubscribed from the 'Daily Alerts' group.
Who has opted out of the 'Seasonal Sales' group?
Retrieve the list of suppressed emails in the 'VIP Members' group.

api_methods.name: Create a parse setting
api_methods.description: This endpoint allows you to create a new inbound parse setting.  The inbound parse webhook allows you to have incoming emails parsed, extracting some or all of the content, and then have that content POSTed by SendGrid to a URL of your choosing.

utterances.utterance: Set up a new inbound email parse setting for me.
I need to create a parse setting for incoming emails.
Can you help me establish a new inbound parse webhook?
I'd like to configure a new setting to parse incoming emails.
Please create a new inbound parse setting for my emails.
How do I set up a new email parse setting?
Initiate a new inbound parse setting for email processing.
Could you create a new setting to parse my incoming emails?
I want to add a new inbound parse webhook for emails.
Help me set up a new inbound email parse configuration.
